original_title: The Animated Adventures of Tom Sawyer
overview: Join Tom Sawyer and Huckleberry Finn on a series of exciting adventures that lead to mischief and mayhem wherever they go. No matter how hard they try, Tom and Huck just can't seem to stay out of trouble - but they have a lot of fun trying! They also learn some important lessons along the way.
title: The Animated Adventures of Tom Sawyer
